mapper.select: SELECT D.DEVICE_NUM , D.OLD_DEVICE_ID , D.USAGE_DIVISION AS USAGE_DIVISION_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE C WHERE C.CATEGORY = 'C007' AND C.CODE = D.USAGE_DIVISION) AS USAGE_DIVISION , D.USAGE_PURPOSE , D.ARCHIVE_LOCATION , D.DEVICE_TYPE AS DEVICE_TYPE_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE C WHERE C.CATEGORY = 'C004' AND C.CODE = D.DEVICE_TYPE) AS DEVICE_TYPE , D.MODEL_NAME , D.MANUFACTURE_DATE , D.CPU_SPEC , D.MEMORY_SIZE , D.STORAGE_INFO , D.OPERATING_SYSTEM , D.SCREEN_SIZE , D.GPU_SPEC , D.DEVICE_STATUS_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE C WHERE C.CATEGORY = 'C005' AND C.CODE = D.DEVICE_STATUS_CODE) AS DEVICE_STATUS , D.APPROVAL_STATUS_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE C WHERE C.CATEGORY = 'C006' AND C.CODE = D.APPROVAL_STATUS_CODE) AS APPROVAL_STATUS , D.PURCHASE_DATE , D.RETURN_DATE , D.REMARKS , D.EMP_NUM , D.CHANGE_REASON , U.USER_NAME , D.MODEL_NAME , D.MANUFACTURE_DATE FROM DEVICE_TEMP D LEFT JOIN USER U ON D.EMP_NUM = U.EMP_NUM WHERE DEVICE_NUM = #{deviceNum}

SELECT DH.HISTORY_NUM, DH.DEVICE_NUM, DH.EMP_NUM, U.USER_NAME, CC1.CODE_NAME AS deviceStatus, CC2.CODE_NAME AS approvalStatus, DH.CHANGE_CONTENTS, DH.REASON, DH.CREATE_DATETIME, DH.CREATE_USER, D.DEVICE_TYPE FROM DEVICE_HISTORY DH INNER JOIN DEVICE D ON DH.DEVICE_NUM = D.DEVICE_NUM LEFT JOIN USER U ON DH.EMP_NUM = U.EMP_NUM LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE CC1 ON DH.DEVICE_STATUS_CODE = CC1.CODE AND CC1.CATEGORY = 'C005' LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE CC2 ON DH.APPROVAL_STATUS_CODE = CC2.CODE AND CC2.CATEGORY = 'C006' WHERE DH.DEVICE_NUM = #{deviceNum}
